name: Presumed Innocent
overview: A horrific murder upends the Chicago Prosecuting Attorney's Office when one of its own is suspected of the crimeâ€”leaving the accused fighting to keep his family together.

episodes.name: Bases Loaded
episodes.overview: Chief deputy prosecutor Rusty Sabich is determined to investigate the horrific murder of his colleague Carolyn Polhemus.

episodes.name: People vs. Rozat Sabich
episodes.overview: Tommy Molto continues to build his case as Raymond comes to Rusty's defense.

episodes.name: Discovery
episodes.overview: Rusty learns of the evidence against him. Barbara looks to protect herself and her family as new secrets emerge.

episodes.name: The Burden
episodes.overview: Kyle is confronted about his whereabouts the night of the murder. Tommy questions Carolyn's son when the case takes a complicated turn.

episodes.name: Pregame
episodes.overview: Raymond insists Rusty is innocent, but the weight of the looming trial pushes the Sabich family to its breaking point.

episodes.name: The Elements
episodes.overview: The trial begins. Startling events inside the courtroom threaten to derail proceedings.

episodes.name: The Witness
episodes.overview: Rusty is forced to pivot his legal strategy. Tommy receives a disturbing message.

episodes.name: The Verdict
episodes.overview: The truth behind Carolyn's murder is revealed.
